greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = 1 + x * A(x)^3 * (2 + A(x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..734
formula: a(n) = (1/n) * Sum_{k=1..n} 3^k * binomial(n,k) * binomial(3*n,k-1) for n > 0.
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[2^(n-k) * Binomial[n, k] * Binomial[3*n + k + 1, n]/(3*n + k + 1), {k, 0, n}]; Array[a, 21, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 28 2020 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1+x*O(x^n)); for(i=0, n, A=1+x*A^3*(2+A)); polcoeff(A, n)}
(PARI) {a(n) = sum(k=0, n, 2^(n-k)*binomial(n, k)*binomial(3*n+k+1, n)/(3*n+k+1))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 28 2020
(PARI) {a(n) = sum(k=0, n, 2^k*binomial(3*n+1, k)*binomial(4*n-k, n-k))/(3*n+1)} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 28 2020
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 25 2020
